section.p: Sterliizes the equipment and provides the sterilization number of the implanted device

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] sterilizationNumber with data type Integer
Contains the sterilization number of the implanted device

Contains zero or one [0..1] device, where its type is Surgery Device
Contains the sterilization number of the implanted device

Contains exactly one [1..1] sterilizationNumber with data type Integer
Contains the sterilization number of the implanted device

Contains zero or one [0..1] device, where its type is Surgery Device
Contains the sterilization number of the implanted device
